name: Mail4registration
body:
Mail server that not only accepts any incoming mail but also clicks on any links in the body of the mail. No need to even go on our website to register or to check your mail, just use *any-random-name*: __*any-random-name*@mail4registration.com__




## Custom Domain

Just set *MX* record on __*yourdomain.com*__ to **mail4registration.com** and you can use __*any-name*@yourdomain.com__

## Disclaimer

We do not store your mail. Your mail is secure. We just follow any links in your mail, and then your mail is secure. No one can read your mail that processed by our servers, not even you. Your mail is safe and completely removed from the existing universe right after processing. Trust us. Love us. about us & follow
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
